attributes.action: Jeremy Hunt MP is replaced as Sectary of State for Health by Sarah Wollaston MP
attributes.additional_details: Given that the NHS is going to shell out £billions, in litigation from the public purse, due to not living up to its role in providing a health service. Should not an expert be the Sectary of State for Health? Insurance even for the rich, does not cover expensive treatment and the USA model is not fit for the UK. Therefore I move the Priminister replace the DOH Sectary of State for Health with Sarah Wollaston MP.
attributes.background: Jeremy Hunt MP, has no understanding of the NHS. In the time he has been in post, he has not lived up to the HSC Act 2012 by taking responsibility of the inequity.Sarah Wollaston MP, previously a GP working 23 years in the field, criticised the Government for lack of funding. Who do you trust?

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Cabinet Ministers to be sacked or fired.
